content: As of today, what mobile applications, that are available via their respective stores, are available that are able to act as clients to FHIR servers?
It doesn't have to be robust, but something that can be used to test our servers without having to write client applications.
Is Apple health the only thing on the horizon?

Apple launched mobile Health app on iOS using FHIR in January 2018 only in a few famous US hospitals:
https://www.apple.com/newsroom/2018/01/apple-announces-effortless-solution-bringing-health-records-to-iPhone/

There is a list of SMART Health IT apps for FHIR Tools plus others of which some are generic:
https://apps.smarthealthit.org/apps/category/fhir-tools
